mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and PicPlate != '' and PicPlate !='未识别'
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and PicPlate ='未识别'
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and PicPlate = ''
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and OBUPlate != ''
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and OBUPlate != '' and PicPlate != '' and PicPlate !='未识别'
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and OBUPlate != '' and PicPlate ='未识别'
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and OBUPlate != '' and PicPlate =''
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and OBUPlate != '' and PicPlate = OBUPlate
